items.sentence: Tom wouldn\'t have come if he didn\'t think it was important to be here.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all think that Boston is a good place to live.
Instead of sitting next to Tom, Mary moved the chair to the other table.
Tom didn\'t deny that he was the one who stole Mary\'s diamond necklace.
Starting today, I\'m going to try to read at least three books per week.
I know that I've met that guy over there, but I don't remember his name.
Tom has been hunting for a job since he lost his previous job last year.
A blue suit, white shirt and red tie are essential for all male workers.
I was afraid to go near Tom's dog because I was afraid it would bite me.
If I'd known that you were sick, I could've visited you in the hospital.
Buying lottery tickets isn't considered a good way to invest your money.
Doing something with someone else is more fun than doing it by yourself.
I can't believe that you aren't at least willing to consider doing that.
I'm beginning to believe we'll never be able to convince Tom he's wrong.
I can't believe you wouldn't enjoy playing cards with me and my friends.
If Tom had been speaking French, I would've been able to understand him.
I'd like to go to Australia, but I don't have enough money to get there.
The small hill turned out to be an ancient burial mound 2,000 years old.
Just because you think it's not possible doesn't mean you shouldn't try.
The most recent report shows that we are lagging behind our competitors.
